headline: Is Booking (BKNG) Quietly Recasting KAYAK’s Role To Sharpen Its Enterprise Travel Edge?
summary: Booking Holdings has reshaped leadership at its KAYAK unit, appointing longtime insider Peer Bueller as CEO while co-founder Steve Hafner moves to Executive Chair and a wider AI-focused role at the parent company. This change coincides with KAYAK for Business launching an Events tool that links large-scale corporate gatherings directly to travel booking and compliance workflows, underscoring Booking Holdings’ push to deepen its technology and payments capabilities across enterprise...
